p: A. absinthium comes from Europe, West Asia and North Africa. It is a species commonly found in Poland, Scotland and England. The species was introduced and acclimatized in North America and South America; it can also be found in Australia. In Kashmir, populations of A. absinthium occupy sites at an altitude of up to 2100 m. It occurs on roadsides, forest felling sites and clearings, as well as wasteland and stony ground [ 1, 6, 7, 10, 14].
